problem_names:
lemmas a0n_defs = 
  a0n_def a0n_init_def a0n_trans_def 
  a0n_running_def a0n_commit_def
lemmas a0n_agreementD = a0n_agreement_def [THEN setc_def_to_dest, rule_format, rotated 2]
translations:
lemmas a0n_defs = 
  a0n_def a0n_init_def a0n_trans_def 
  a0n_running_def a0n_commit_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. obs a0n = id

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. observable (obs a0n) P

definition 
  a0n_agreement :: "a0n_state set" 
where
  "a0n_agreement \<equiv> {s. \<forall>A B M.
     signals s (Commit A B M) > 0 \<longrightarrow> signals s (Running A B M) > 0
  }"
lemmas a0n_agreementD = a0n_agreement_def [THEN setc_def_to_dest, rule_format, rotated 2]

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. init a0n \<subseteq> a0n_agreement
by (auto simp add: a0n_defs intro!: a0n_agreementI)
by (auto simp add: PO_hoare_defs a0n_defs intro!: a0n_agreementI)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. reach a0n \<subseteq> a0n_agreement

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. oreach a0n \<subseteq> a0n_agreement

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. obs a0n ` reach a0n \<subseteq> a0n_agreement
